data.name: shapez - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The shapez.io original soundtrack consists of over an hour of chill electronic music to lighten up your day.

It contains all 11 tracks (MP3/WAV) from the base game, as well as the 5 brand new tracks specifically composed for the Puzzle DLC.

Written and produced by Peppsen (Petter Sumelius).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 766 MB available space
